name: safer-runner
description: Network security layer for GitHub Actions with DNS filtering and log analysis

scripts.build: tsc && ncc build lib/main.js -o dist/main --license licenses.txt && mv dist/main/index.js dist/main.js
scripts.build:pre: ncc build lib/pre.js -o dist/pre --license licenses.txt && mv dist/pre/index.js dist/pre.js
scripts.build:post: ncc build lib/post.js -o dist/post --license licenses.txt && mv dist/post/index.js dist/post.js
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run format && npm test && npm run build && npm run build:pre && npm run build:post

author: PortSwigger
